text: Is there a way to prevent columns being nested (I think) when using the drag and drop editor
I'm having trouble duplicating the layout of 2 rows that feature essentially the same content
interestingly enough, the issue (hopefully) was that the rows needed to be aligned to the top
but that was infinitely confusing because that seems to show up as an extra box around one of the items

Hello,

I was creating a Drag & Drop template in HTML & Hubl and I would like to have a 1 to the left offset on my right module. I don't know how to achieve this behavior. Is it possible?

Here is my current code:

`{% dnd_area "body_dnd_area" class='body-container body-container--terms', label='Main Section' %}`
  `{% dnd_section %}`


  `{% dnd_module path='../../modules/mega-sidebar.module', offset=0, width=2 %}`
  `{% end_dnd_module %}`


  `{% dnd_column offset=3, width=9 , horizontal_alignment='RIGHT'%}`
  `{% widget_container "flexible_column", horizontal_alignment='RIGHT' %}`
  `{% end_widget_container %}`


  `{% end_dnd_column %}`

  `{% end_dnd_section %}`

  `{% end_dnd_area %}`

Thanks for your help :slightly_smiling_face:
